channel.title: Europe on Wesley Tian
channel.description: Recent content in Europe on Wesley Tian

item.title: Climbing Mt. Olympus
item.description: Pic: View from Mt. Olympus Pic: Sunrise at Refuge A I always like to plan things out before I do them. Especially with hiking mountains in a country of which language I did not know, it was especially crucial for me to plan things out before hand. I searched online and found close to nothing that would help me prepare for Mt. Olympus. I basically went to Greece with no knowledge of Mt.
